titleStmt.title: SII 7.1041: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1041. (A.R. No. 408 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . taṇṭiccaraṉ Olai cākarañ cuḻ
vaiyyakattu kaṇṭiccuraṉ karuma
m Ārāymiṉ paṇṭe Aṟañ
ceytāṉ ceytāṉ Aṟaṅ kā
ttāṉ pātan tiṟampāmal ceṉṉi
mel vaittu Ātitaṇṭeśvaraṉ
Ātecam . nāyaṉār tirukkiḷāUṭai
yār Ulakuṭaiyaperumāḷuk
ku naṉṟākap pūjai koṇṭaruḷukiṟa nā
yaṉār cutaiyāle piṭamāy Irunta
maiyil tribhuvaṉaccakravatti maturaiyum Ī
ḻamum pāṇṭiyaṉ muṭittalaiyuṅ koṇṭa
ruḷiṉa śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevarkku yā
ṇṭu patiṉeṭṭāvatu mārkaḻimāsavarai
yum śrīpiṭañcārttāte Eḻuntaruḷi Irukkai
yālum Āṭṭāṇṭutoṟum pacuṅkūṭṭā
le jīrṇṇottāram paṇṇaveṇṭukaiyā
lum Iruṉtavāṟe Ikkoyilpaṟṟu
piṭitta maṇalūr vātulaṉ Ārāvamatu mātevarāṉa vikkiramacoḻa
ppirammārāyarkku Ikkoyil caivācāriyam cevvārkaḷ śrīcatācivapaṭṭar palanāḷum nirmā
liyacāṅkariyamāy Irāniṉṟatenṟu Aṟivittamaiyil Ivvikkiramacoḻa
ppiramārāyar tevar śrīvāmatevaṟkum Ulakuṭaiyanāyanārkkum viṇ
ṇappañceytu tiruviḷḷamāy caivaccakkaravattikaḷum caivācā
riyam cevvārkaḷ kaiyyolaiyum gaṇitacakkaravattikaḷum kulo
ttuṅkacoḻa gaṇitātirāyarum Iṭṭa nāḷilum kurattāluñ cilaiyā
le cipiṭam cāttuka Enṟu tiruviḷḷamāṉamaiyil Iccipiṭattukku Uṭalā
ka vikkiramacoḻapirammaārāyar cākkilninṟum Āyiraṅ kācu tantu
Ikkācu nikki veṇṭuvutu cipaṇṭāratte Iṭṭu ceyka Enṟu connamai
yil noṭiyūrpaṭṭaṇattu kiḷḷiyūrmalaiyilninṟum cilai koṇṭuvantu
cāttirāttammāṉapaṭiye śrīpiṭam ceytu cātta pukkamaiyil Ācāriyar
kaḷ nilaininṟu cāttamāṭṭāmaiyil koyilkāṇiuṭaiya ta
ccācāriyum nittavinotavaḷanāṭṭu kiḻāṟkūṟṟattu ni
varampūruṭaiyān tevanṉāṉa Utayativākaraācāriyan nān cā
ttukiṟeṉ Eṉṟamaiyil tāṉattārum Uṉakku veṇṭum ciṟappu taṉtu
cipiṭam cārttiṉapaṭikku Iṟaiyiliyāka nilamum tarukiṟomeṉṟu ve
ṇṭikkoṇṭamaiyil Ivaṉum Ivaṉ makka ḷaṉaivarumāka Iccipiṭam OruOru
virotamiṉṟiye cāttiviṭṭamaiyil Ivaṉukku Iṟaiiliyāka Ūṟipaṭi Araimā
nila miṭapaṇṇukaveṉṟu koyilyilpaṟṟu piṭitta piḷḷai vikkiramacoḻa piramā
maārāyar Ōlai vantamaiyil Ivaṉukku Iṟaiyiliyāka viṭṭa putatturāṉa tiripuvaṉamātevicatup
petimaṅkalattu poṉ koṇṭu policaikku polivūṭ ṭurkki ḻiṟaiyili Ivvūr piṭākaiv viracoḻanallūrril kavuca
laivatikku meṟku gaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku Añcāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu muṉṟām caturattu meṟkaṭaiya marukalūruṭaiyān paṟṟān
Ūṟpaṭi nilam Araimā Innilam Araimāvum māttāl muppatiṉ kalamāka vanta nellu peṟakkaṭavanākavum peṟu
maiṭattu koyiltaraviṉṟiyile kaiyiṭu kuṭuttu koṇṭavaṉ Ākavum Ikkaiyiṭe kuṭimakkaḷukku cilavāvutaākavum Ippaṭi cantirāti
ttavaṟ cācelvatāka kallum veṭṭikkoḻka Ivaṉukkum Ivaṉ vaṟkattāṟkum Ippaṭi peṟuvārkaḷ ko
yilkaṇakku śrīpūtiUṭaiyāṉ tirukkiḷāvuṭaiyān makaṉ tiruvāykulamuṭaiyāṉāṉa piḷḷaiveḷāṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.1041 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
